message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs perfectly. It comes with advanced features and top-notch quality. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 seems a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a competitive offer. Considering the value and features of the product, I am willing to negotiate at $140. I hope this price aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $135. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal is more agreeable to you.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $132.50?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price. After reviewing our costs and considering your offer, I am willing to accept $133. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while being fair to both parties.
I'm getting close to accepting, Alice. Would you be willing to shave off another $1 to meet me at $132?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I'm glad we're closing in on an agreement. After further review, I am willing to accept $132 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both of us and I'm confident you'll find the product to be of great value.
